channel.title: Cloudpods – release/3.8
channel.description: Recent content in release/3.8 on Cloudpods

item.title: Docs: v3.8.2
item.description:
发布时间 2021-10-10 14:30:19

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

14 commits to cloudpods - v3.8.2 since this release.

Bug Fixes (13)

  • webconsole close socket when read on error (9025a5661, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: change cat path (04521a154, Zexi Li)
  • climc: host-ssh use privateKey when ciphertext too short (#12371) (a50782ab5, Zexi Li)
  • glance: remove image clean (#12376) (3d8a727eb, 屈轩)
  • host: show disk details error (#12375) (49366c517, 屈轩)
  • monitor: use swagger ignore comment out structs (bf99c1d82, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: alert record details add trigger_time field (e55aa144f, zhaoxiangchun)
  • notify: add default policy for subscribers (4c12de8ee, rainzm)
  • notify: modify the width of ReceiverId (6fb58e8c6, rainzm)
  • notify: update mobile where appropriate (cb264e7d1, rainzm)
  • region: sync resource by capability with read only (0988bf157, Qu Xuan)
  • region: fix cloudpods scheduler error (a55732b78, Qu Xuan)
  • region: network brand (c53164e43, Qu Xuan)

Others (1)

  • kvm lb update lb listener redirect code fix (c80945338, tangbin)

dashboard

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

7 commits to dashboard - v3.8.2 since this release.

Bug Fixes (3)

  • read only capability filter (f021fb627, Qu Xuan)
  • close cloud shell when disconnect from server (620e6212a, Qiu Jian)
  • add sol and jnlp console to converted host (dcbce3db4, Qiu Jian)

Features (1)

  • dns add tag filter (51cf493df, GuoLiBin6)

Others (3)

  • feat[3.8]: add dns_recordset tag edit (12eeef047, GuoLiBin6)
  • feat[3.8]: dns add tab-edit perform action (4de54e621, GuoLiBin6)
  • fix[3.6]: default os_arch (968b6b0ba, GuoLiBin6)

cloudpods
